statements: SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT id, location, energy_output FROM energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT location, production_date, production_time, energy_source FROM energy_production WHERE energy_output > 1000
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' AND energy_output <= 5000
SELECT id, location, energy_output FROM energy_production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY energy_output DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE energy_source='Solar' ORDER BY production_date DESC, production_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_output) AS total_output FROM energy_production WHERE production_date>=DATE('2022-01-01') GROUP BY location HAVING total_output>1000;
SELECT location, AVG(energy_output) AS avg_output FROM energy_production GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_output DESC;
SELECT energy_source, COUNT(*) AS source_count FROM energy_production GROUP BY energy_source ORDER BY source_count DESC;
SELECT location, MAX(energy_output) AS max_output, MIN(energy_output) AS min_output FROM energy_production WHERE production_date='2022-07-01' GROUP BY location ORDER BY max_output DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT id, location FROM SolarPanels WHERE production > 100;
SELECT production, location FROM WindTurbines WHERE location LIKE 'North%';
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY panel_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(production) AS average_production FROM WindTurbines;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE production > 100 ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT panel_id, AVG(production) as avg_production FROM SolarPanels GROUP BY panel_id HAVING avg_production > 200 ORDER BY avg_production DESC;
SELECT panel_id, COUNT(*) as total_panels FROM SolarPanels GROUP BY panel_id ORDER BY total_panels DESC;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE production BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY turbine_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT location, SUM(production) as total_production FROM SolarPanels GROUP BY location HAVING total_production > 1000 ORDER BY total_production DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT panel_id, capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM solar_panels GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines WHERE height > 50 ORDER BY rotor_diameter DESC;
SELECT production_id, source, production_date FROM energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, location, capacity, efficiency FROM solar_panels ORDER BY efficiency DESC, capacity ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_panels FROM solar_panels
SELECT turbine_id, location, height, rotor_diameter FROM wind_turbines WHERE height > 100 ORDER BY rotor_diameter ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT source, SUM(amount) AS total_energy FROM energy_production GROUP BY source ORDER BY total_energy DESC
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT panel_id, capacity FROM SolarPanels WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE height > 100 ORDER BY rotor_diameter DESC;
SELECT AVG(efficiency) AS avg_efficiency FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT production_date, SUM(energy_produced) AS total_energy_produced FROM EnergyProduction GROUP BY production_date ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT panel_id, capacity, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY efficiency ASC
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE height > 50 AND rotor_diameter BETWEEN 100 AND 150
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_produced DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT panel_id, location, capacity, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE capacity < 500 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE blade_length > 50
SELECT location, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency < 0.85
SELECT timestamp, energy_amount FROM EnergyProduction ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT calculation_id, timestamp, self_sufficiency_rate FROM EnergySelfSufficiency
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT AVG(efficiency) AS avg_efficiency FROM SolarPanels
SELECT location, blade_length FROM WindTurbines WHERE blade_length > 50 ORDER BY blade_length DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE energy_type = 'Solar' AND energy_amount > 100
SELECT MAX(energy_amount) AS max_energy_amount FROM EnergyConsumption
